will this fit on a single dvd
Standard DVD = 4.37 GB.  So to answer several of your questions, NO THIS WILL NOT FIT ON A SINGLE LAYER DVD.  You will need either a dual-layer DVD (DL) or at least an 8 GB USB Flash Drive.
A standard DVD is 4.7GB- not 4.37.

@demis1159
Codes will work for install, but not for activation.  Haven't seen Windows 8 activation defeated yet.

Open command promt as admin
If you are using Pro, type these lines ONE BY ONE!
slmgr -ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato

If you are using Enterprise:
slmgr.vbs -ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr /ato
slmgr /dli
